WorkItem.Description:
Yesterday I was trying to run my web app in my Linux machine and I've noticed a problem with some PHPExcel's files and folders names. This is not an issue on Windows, but Linux is case sensitive, so I don't think it will hurt making PHPExcel a little bit more compatible. The changes I had to make in order to get it working were (all inside the "PHPExcel/Shared/" folder):
 
jama/ -> JAMA/
ole/ -> OLE/
ole/ole_pps.php -> OLE/OLE_PPS.php
ole.php -> OLE.php
Escher/DggContainer/BstoreContainer/bse/ Escher/DggContainer/BstoreContainer/BSE/
Escher/DggContainer/BstoreContainer/bse.php Escher/DggContainer/BstoreContainer/BSE.php
 
Cheers,
Alex Tercete
